aircraft.value: Albatross Transport - AC-6831-188 at Base Delta

defect_observed.value: Ignition system misfire. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 14/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 16/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 17/04/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 20/04/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 24/04/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta
